value: An aerial view of the city.

There are several buses connecting the city (from Algiers, Constantine, Batna, Ghardaia, Annaba and more). The bus stop is about 2km from the town centre (the Ain El Foura fountain) and there are several cabs you can take to get there for about 100DA. 

Setif also has an airport with flights to and from Algiers.

value: content=This very picturesque former Roman town is definitely worth a visit. It is possible to walk amongst the ruins and take a close look at the structures. However, there are no signs at the site, so a map or guide will be helpful.
directions=2 blocks east of the fountain and then turn south
content=One of the few places in Setif which serves alcohol, the food is some of the best you will find in Algeria outside of the capital.
directions=Two blocks east of the fountain Ain El Foura
content=The rooms include air-conditioning, TV, and wi-fi.
